name: Kids Playing Blocks Attack
description:
Kids Playing Block Attack is a game in which the blocks have taken the shape of bricks and are attacking the totem which has the power to reverse the playing blocks to its original form.

As the game starts, you play as the magical totem which controls the power to reverse the spell cast on the bricks. The totem is placed on the last standing wall of blocks. The blocks will be coming your way trying to hit you and knock you off the wall. You have to keep moving in order to save yourself.
You can tap the screen to change the direction in which the totem is moving. The game features single touch controls so it is extremely easy to play.

The game consists of beautiful and vibrant colors which will appeal to the player's eyes. The game itself is pretty straight forward.

Try to stay alive as long as possible and try to collect magical cubes for extra points. The wall changes its direction after every 20 points. Also the side blocks of the wall will move down after the 15th point.
So make sure you are not on the edge when you complete 15 points.
